idea:
KIRVAN VENDSOL PVT LTD – a Startup in the field of Manufacture and Distribution of Female Sanitary Pads and Mechanical Disposal of the same

We at KIRVAN VENDSOL PVT LTD have initiated with an idea of providing technological solution for

(1) Manufacture and distribution of Sanitary Pads

(2) Mechanical Disposal of Used sanitary Pads

Distribution through chain of sales agent and using Automated Vending machine, and disposal of used pads by Mini electric Furnace specially designed to burn the sanitary pads and produce minimum to zero smoke or pollution.
name: KIRVAN VENDSOL PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Chiliad Procons Private Limited, trying to be a differentiator by creating global standards of strategy, designs and development in its line of business. The group is putting all its efforts towards being a distinguished player in the amusement industry. The best in technology and concepts are ready to take over the Indian market, reassuring visitors to step and experience beyond their imagination. Each project is a unique legacy to the World of Entertainment being it Snow World in Mumbai and Delhi, THE GAME (luxury entertainment arena) in Mumbai which makes Gaming just not an FEC but a luxury product; Baraanaa – World Cocktail Bar & Kitchen is another luxury restaurant of the company. The projects under the group umbrella are carefully outlined to provide perfect blend of adrenaline rush and elation from 10,000 sq feet to 1,00,000 sq feet.


Acts as a conduit for innovation and creativity in those essential sectors of Businesses in India, which inherit a personal need of an Individual. The company is willing to implement the leading-edge technologies and products in strategic alliance with world-class international corporations, to create landmark destinations across the Nation, in the field of Entertainment and Tourism with alliances that are best in technology across the Globe.


The company has tied hands with DQE to soon launch the first Jungle Book Theme Park, Peterpan and Robinhood Parks. Many such collaborations in Chiliad Procons Private Limited makes us a differentiator in our line of Business
name: CHILIAD PROCONS PRIVATE LIMITED
